html:
The Steam summer sale is coming, slated to show up next week.  But some sales are already underway elsewhere, including the GoG.com summer sale, which runs through until July 9, 2025.

Summer Sale 2025

GoG.com, know for preserving and making old titles playable again, has quite a catalog of titles and has a lot of them marked down now for their summer sale.

Celebrate summer with 8000+ deals, great classics, new titles, discounts up to -95% and more!

And, as always, the titles you buy from them are DRM free, so when you download the installer you can move them along to new machines without returning to their site or using their client.

As always, supporting GoG.com supports their game preservation work as well.
